item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network 2018 - Black Background
item.description: A network graph showing 426 programming languages connected by 670 influence relations. Highly influential languages like Lisp, Smalltalk, C, Java, C++, Haskell and Python are shown as larger circles as compared to languages with less influence on others like PHP, Rust and Go. The influence relation data was retrieved from Wikidata in 2018. A great gift for programmers who are into digital art. â€¢ Also buy this artwork on wall prints, apparel, phone cases, and more.
